mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UME_WECHAT_USER ( USER_ID, WECHAT_OPENID, WECHAT_CITY, WECHAT_COUNTRY, WECHAT_HEADIMGURL, WECHAT_LANGUAGE, WECHAT_NICKNAME, WECHAT_PROVINCE, WECHAT_SEX, WECHAT_UNIONID, WECHAT_PRIVILEGE, WECHAT_GROUPID, WECHAT_TAGID_LIST, WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE, WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{wechatOpenid}, #{wechatCity}, #{wechatCountry}, #{wechatHeadimgurl}, #{wechatLanguage}, #{wechatNickname}, #{wechatProvince}, #{wechatSex}, #{wechatUnionid}, #{wechatPrivilege}, #{wechatGroupid}, #{wechatTagidList}, #{wechatSubscribe}, #{wechatSubscribeTime}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE UME_WECHAT_USER SET WECHAT_OPENID = #{wechatOpenid}, WECHAT_CITY = #{wechatCity}, WECHAT_COUNTRY = #{wechatCountry}, WECHAT_HEADIMGURL = #{wechatHeadimgurl}, WECHAT_LANGUAGE = #{wechatLanguage}, WECHAT_NICKNAME = #{wechatNickname}, WECHAT_PROVINCE = #{wechatProvince}, WECHAT_SEX = #{wechatSex}, WECHAT_UNIONID = #{wechatUnionid}, WECHAT_PRIVILEGE = #{wechatPrivilege}, WECHAT_GROUPID = #{wechatGroupid}, WECHAT_TAGID_LIST = #{wechatTagidList}, WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE = #{wechatSubscribe}, WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME = #{wechatSubscribeTime}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS "userId", WECHAT_OPENID AS "wechatOpenid", WECHAT_CITY AS "wechatCity", WECHAT_COUNTRY AS "wechatCountry", WECHAT_HEADIMGURL AS "wechatHeadimgurl", WECHAT_LANGUAGE AS "wechatLanguage", WECHAT_NICKNAME AS "wechatNickname", WECHAT_PROVINCE AS "wechatProvince", WECHAT_SEX AS "wechatSex", WECHAT_UNIONID AS "wechatUnionid", WECHAT_PRIVILEGE AS "wechatPrivilege", WECHAT_GROUPID AS "wechatGroupid", WECHAT_TAGID_LIST AS "wechatTagidList", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE AS "wechatSubscribe", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME AS "wechatSubscribeTime", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM UME_WECHAT_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT USER_ID AS "userId", WECHAT_OPENID AS "wechatOpenid", WECHAT_CITY AS "wechatCity", WECHAT_COUNTRY AS "wechatCountry", WECHAT_HEADIMGURL AS "wechatHeadimgurl", WECHAT_LANGUAGE AS "wechatLanguage", WECHAT_NICKNAME AS "wechatNickname", WECHAT_PROVINCE AS "wechatProvince", WECHAT_SEX AS "wechatSex", WECHAT_UNIONID AS "wechatUnionid", WECHAT_PRIVILEGE AS "wechatPrivilege", WECHAT_GROUPID AS "wechatGroupid", WECHAT_TAGID_LIST AS "wechatTagidList", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE AS "wechatSubscribe", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME AS "wechatSubscribeTime", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM UME_WECHAT_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT USER_ID AS "userId", WECHAT_OPENID AS "wechatOpenid", WECHAT_CITY AS "wechatCity", WECHAT_COUNTRY AS "wechatCountry", WECHAT_HEADIMGURL AS "wechatHeadimgurl", WECHAT_LANGUAGE AS "wechatLanguage", WECHAT_NICKNAME AS "wechatNickname", WECHAT_PROVINCE AS "wechatProvince", WECHAT_SEX AS "wechatSex", WECHAT_UNIONID AS "wechatUnionid", WECHAT_PRIVILEGE AS "wechatPrivilege", WECHAT_GROUPID AS "wechatGroupid", WECHAT_TAGID_LIST AS "wechatTagidList", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE AS "wechatSubscribe", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME AS "wechatSubscribeTime", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM UME_WECHAT_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%') AND WECHAT_OPENID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatOpenid}, '%') AND WECHAT_CITY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatCity}, '%') AND WECHAT_COUNTRY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatCountry}, '%') AND WECHAT_HEADIMGURL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatHeadimgurl}, '%') AND WECHAT_LANGUAGE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatLanguage}, '%') AND WECHAT_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatNickname}, '%') AND WECHAT_PROVINCE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatProvince}, '%') AND WECHAT_SEX LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatSex}, '%') AND WECHAT_UNIONID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatUnionid}, '%') AND WECHAT_PRIVILEGE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatPrivilege}, '%') AND WECHAT_GROUPID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatGroupid}, '%') AND WECHAT_TAGID_LIST LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatTagidList}, '%') AND WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatSubscribe}, '%') AND WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wechatSubscribeTime}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT USER_ID AS "userId", WECHAT_OPENID AS "wechatOpenid", WECHAT_CITY AS "wechatCity", WECHAT_COUNTRY AS "wechatCountry", WECHAT_HEADIMGURL AS "wechatHeadimgurl", WECHAT_LANGUAGE AS "wechatLanguage", WECHAT_NICKNAME AS "wechatNickname", WECHAT_PROVINCE AS "wechatProvince", WECHAT_SEX AS "wechatSex", WECHAT_UNIONID AS "wechatUnionid", WECHAT_PRIVILEGE AS "wechatPrivilege", WECHAT_GROUPID AS "wechatGroupid", WECHAT_TAGID_LIST AS "wechatTagidList", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE AS "wechatSubscribe", WECHAT_SUBSCRIBE_TIME AS "wechatSubscribeTime", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM UME_WECHAT_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${userId} ) AND ( ${wechatOpenid} ) AND ( ${wechatCity} ) AND ( ${wechatCountry} ) AND ( ${wechatHeadimgurl} ) AND ( ${wechatLanguage} ) AND ( ${wechatNickname} ) AND ( ${wechatProvince} ) AND ( ${wechatSex} ) AND ( ${wechatUnionid} ) AND ( ${wechatPrivilege} ) AND ( ${wechatGroupid} ) AND ( ${wechatTagidList} ) AND ( ${wechatSubscribe} ) AND ( ${wechatSubscribeTime} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
